headline: SET SAIL ON A VACATION THAT NOTHING COMES CLOSE TO, AS CELEBRITY CRUISES REVEALS THE FIRST OF ITS 2027-2028 ITINERARIES
summary: From Sydney to Santorini, get ready for a vacation that Nothing Comes Close to with Celebrity Cruises' 2027-2028 itineraries in Europe, Alaska, Hawaii, Australia, Japan, Canada and New England. Guests can enjoy more than 175 itineraries to experience more than 180 unforgettable destinations spanning culture-rich cities to natural wonders.
